## Load the Package

```{r setup}
library(semtree)
```

## Simulate data

```{r)
N <- 100
x <- rnorm(N)
```

## Specify an OpenMx model

```{r)
manifests <- names(dataset)[1:5]
growthCurveModel <- mxModel("Linear Growth Curve Model Path Specification",
    type="RAM",
       manifestVars=manifests,
    latentVars=c("intercept","slope"),
    mxData(dataset, type="raw"),
    # residual variances
    mxPath(
        from=manifests,
        arrows=2,
        free=TRUE,
        values = c(.1, .1, .1, .1, .1),
        labels=c("residual","residual","residual","residual","residual")
    ),
    # latent variances and covariance
    mxPath(
        from=c("intercept","slope"),
        arrows=2,
        connect="unique.pairs",
        free=TRUE,
        values=c(2, 0, 1),
        labels=c("vari", "cov", "vars")
    ),
    # intercept loadings
    mxPath(
        from="intercept",
        to=manifests,
        arrows=1,
        free=FALSE,
        values=c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1)
    ),
    # slope loadings
    mxPath(
        from="slope",
        to=manifests,
        arrows=1,
        free=FALSE,
        values=c(0, 1, 2, 3, 4)
    ),
    # manifest means
    mxPath(
        from="one",
        to=manifests,
        arrows=1,
        free=FALSE,
        values=c(0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    ),
    # latent means
    mxPath(
        from="one",
        to=c("intercept", "slope"),
        arrows=1,
        free=TRUE,
        values=c(1, 1),
        labels=c("meani", "means")
    )
) # close model
```
